metadata.title: CVE-2021-47135 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mt76:mt7921: fix possible AOOB issue in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report Fix possiblearray out of bound access in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report. Remove unnecessaryvaribable in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia - 6.5.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required
